ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Digest Number 345
ygData.msgSnippet: At 11:37 AM 11/22/00 +0000, you wrote: I m Elf SunWuKong lvl 5. Damn tough as fighting now as mercenary Elf for humans against orc invasion. Everytime I hit
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:37 AM 11/22/00 +0000, you wrote:

I'm Elf SunWuKong lvl 5. Damn tough as fighting now as mercenary Elf for
humans against orc invasion. Everytime I hit lvl 6 and I die I drop one
level back to 5.



>Message: 2
> Date: Wed, 22 Nov 2000 08:06:19 +0800
> From: Dexter <dexterw@...>
>Subject: [Lineage] Ok who is playing this game?
>
>Well server was down for so long yesterday, I downloaded this
>game(164meg!!!) to try it out since Stupid Merns and company also playing.
>I only got to choose a server when I go in, so I persume everyone is in the
>same server? What lvl are u all now and char name? Inside the people not as
>friend as EQ, tok to them mostly wont reply one :(
>Game is quite good(considering only in beta) but only thing bad is it can
>only walk, cant fun :(]
>Played a knight and was suprised to see "Training dummies" exactly the same
>as the one in UO! Those type of thingy where newbies go and keep clicking
>to hit the dummies to gain skills in UO remember? But this time this one
>lets U gain xp till lv 4. Took me 10mins to get my knight to lv 4.
>Anyway like to ask...how to cast spells? OR is my lv 4 Elf too young to
>cast any?
>And regarding taming animals, is it whack the animal to near death, then
>feed it? This is whats been told to me. Correct?
>
>Galarion Elf lv 4(deleted)
>Aphrael Elf lv 4
>Arkana Elf lv 3
>Galarion Knight lv 4
>
>SPECIAL: Go to http://home.pacific.net.sg/~dexterwong/friends.html and send
>it to your friends. You'll be suprised how many true friends you have!
>
